projects.title: AI-Based IT Training System
projects.subtitle: Smart India Hackathon 2023
projects.description: Designed and implemented an AI-driven IT training platform that dynamically generates personalized learning paths based on individual student knowledge levels.
highlights: Built a system that dynamically generates personalized learning paths
Integrated Generative AI (Gemini API) to customize course content and recommendations in real time
Achieved high accuracy in personalized content delivery, improving learning relevance and user engagement

projects.title: Parsons Problem Generator
projects.subtitle: Academic Project
projects.description: Developed a system to generate Parsons problems categorized by difficulty levels to enhance logic-based learning.
highlights: Generated Parsons problems categorized into easy, medium, and hard difficulty levels
Shifted assessment focus from syntax memorization to logical reasoning using automated test cases
Designed an interactive frontend for problem creation and evaluation
